en: Peppa and George are playing hide and seek.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在玩捉迷藏。

en: It is George's turn to hide.
He must quickly find somewhere to hide before Peppa finishes counting!
zh: 他必须要在佩奇数完数前赶快找地方藏起来。

en: One... two... three...
four... five... six... seven...eight...nine...
George has found somewhere to hide just in time!
zh: 乔治正好及时找到地方藏起来了

en: ten...
Ready or not.
Here I come!
Peppa has to find where George is hiding.
zh: 佩奇要找到乔治藏在哪。

en: Found you!
Peppa has found George.
George, I could see you too easily.
zh: 乔治，我很容易就看到你了。

en: Now it is Peppa's turn to hide.
One... erm... three.
I'll help George to count.
One... two... three... four... five...
six... seven... eight... nine... ten!
Okay, George, open your eyes!
zh: 好了，乔治，挣开你的眼睛吧！

en: George has to find where Peppa is hiding.
zh: 乔治要找到佩奇藏在哪。

en: Peppa isn't hiding under the table.
George, have you thought of looking upstairs?
zh: 乔治，你有没有想过上楼上看看？

en: Peppa isn't under the bed.
zh: 佩奇也没有藏在床底下。

en: What was that strange noise?
Peppa isn't behind the curtain.
zh: 佩奇也没有藏在窗帘后。

en: There is that strange noise again!
What can it be?
George has found where Peppa was hiding.
zh: 乔治找到佩奇藏在哪了。

en: George found me!
Now it's Daddy's turn to hide!
Oh, I think George should have another turn.
zh: 哦，我想乔治应该再藏一次。

en: But George isn't very good at hiding...
I'm sure he'll be better this time.
zh: 我相信他这次会藏得很好的。

en: Close your eyes and start counting.
zh: 闭上你的眼睛开始数吧。

en: One... two...three... four...
Oh, dear. Peppa will easily find George.
zh: 哦，糟糕。佩奇会很容易找到乔治的。

en: five...six...
George! Come over here...
seven...eight... nine... ten!
Ready or not, here I come!
Oh, George isn't hiding under the table!
zh: 哦，乔治没有藏在桌底下！

en: But George always hides under the table!
zh: 但是乔治以前总藏在桌底下的！

en: Have you thought of looking upstairs?
zh: 你有没有想过看看楼上呢？

en: I know where he is!
George is in the toy basket.
zh: 乔治肯定藏在玩具篮里。

en: George is not in the toy basket!
zh: 乔治没有藏到玩具篮里！

en: Where can he be?
Peppa can not find George anywhere.
Daddy? I can't find George anywhere.
Oh, dear, I wonder where he can be.
zh: 哦，这样啊，我很想知道他会藏到哪。

en: Actually, I think there's something about George in this newspaper...
zh: 事实上，我想报纸上有些关于乔治的消息。。。

en: George! Found you!
Oh, George!
That was a good place to hide!
zh: 那真是一个捉迷藏的好地方！

en: George was hiding behind Daddy Pig's newspaper all the time!
zh: 原来乔治一真藏在猪爸爸的报纸后面！
